scripts.package: npm run build:prod && build && npm run clean
scripts.server:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ESM_DISABLE_CACHE=true TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.base.json ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=true HOT_MODULES=true electron --inspect --remote-debugging-port=9222 -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register/type-check src/bin/app.ts
scripts.server:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ESM_DISABLE_CACHE=true TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.base.json ELECTRON_DISABLE_SECURITY_WARNINGS=true electron -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register/transpile-only src/bin/app.ts
scripts.build:base: npm run clean && cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=tsconfig.base.json webpack
